    • 方法详细资料

      • create

        public static boolean create(java.lang.String sid,
                             long expired,
                             int w,
                             int h,
                             java.io.OutputStream output,
                             int len)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        output the "code image" to the file.
        参数:
        sid - the session id
        expired - the expired timestamp
        w - the width of the image
        h - the height of the image
        output - the output file
        len - the length of the code
        返回:
        String of the code
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw exception when write image to the file

      • verify

        public static Captcha.Result verify(java.lang.String sid,
                                    java.lang.String code)
        verify the code associated.
        参数:
        sid - the session id
        code - the code
        返回:
        Result

      • remove

        public static void remove(java.lang.String sid)
        remove the captcha code for sid.
        参数:
        sid - the session id

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        The main method.
        参数:
        args - the arguments
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
